attributes.comment:
RE: U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services, docket number USCIS-2006- 0044.

Please do not raise any fees associated with adoption
[I-600/600A,N-565,N-600,Biometric Services (fingerprints), et al.] Adoption is
already more expensive than need be. Raising the price of these needed forms
will price adoption out of the average family.
We are currently in the process of adopting, the cost has been a great burden on
our family. Due to infertility we have no other means of adding to our family.
Also due to previous treatments and the financial, physical and emotional toll
these things have taken already, our family has been experiencing a lot of
hardship. Please do not raise any fees associated with adoption, in fact I
believe you should drop them. Or streamline them, this is the 21st century, with
computers and national/international databases things should be getting simpler
and less expensive NOT more time consuming and expensive.
I find docket number USCIS-2006- 0044 to be an affront to the american family
and to orphaned children. This clearly takes advantage of all parties involved
in adoption, and profits from infertility and abandonment. I find it appalling
(FYI, I am holding back and trying to be polite as well as articulate when
clearly I am very angry).

Sincerely,
Crystal Barlow

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comments submitted by Crystal R. Barlow
